data.name: ActorMustHaveAScenarioId
data.value: All actors must have an identifier which references the current scenario.

data.name: ActorMustHaveAName
data.value: All actors must have a name.

data.name: DuplicateActorsNotAllowedInCast
data.value: There is already an actor named '{name}' contained within the current {1}. Duplicates are not permitted.

data.name: IntegrationConfigTypeMustImplementCorrectInterface
data.value: The integration configuration type must implement `{0}'.

data.name: MustBeAnActorInTheSpotlight
data.value: There is no actor currently in the spotlight.
